author: Louise Hall, Louise Hall
title: 'I kinda got a cure for this': Trump Golf retweets video of John Daly joking vodka can 'kill coronavirus'
description: Consuming alcohol will not destroy virus and may make people more susceptible to disease, World Health Organisation warns
content:
President Donald Trumps golf company has shared a video of a professional golfer jokingly endorsing vodka as a cure for coronavirus.
John Daly, a professional golfer from California, was originally seen in the video posted on YouTube, seemingly jesting that … [+1894 chars]
